positions.title: System Engineer
positions.descriptionIntro: I work in part of BASF team as a Full Stack Developer, My responsibility are:
descriptionDetailList: Understanding the business requirement and coming up with an optimal solution.
Our Backend requirements were implemented in Java using Springboot and PostgreSQL if a Database is required.
Developed interactive web applications using Reactjs & Angular which help us to build the reusable components.
Moreover, I am responsible for writing the test case and have to carry out the E2E testing.
Supporting the production is also our responsibility.

positions.title: Software Engineer
positions.descriptionIntro: I work in the MERN & MEAN stack development team,
descriptionDetailList: My responsibility is to design & develop the REST API & Database Model as well as developing interactive Web Apps. We mostly build On-Demand applications that include the Customer - Provider Register & Login Module, Social Media Login, SMS & Email Notification, Push Notification, Chat Module, Audio/Video Call Module, Payment Integration, Admin Module and more.
After development is completed, its our responsibility to perform unit testing and fix its bugs.

projects.title: Bala Ganapathy Parthiban
projects.description: This is my personal portfolio that you are currenty viewing, If you are liked my work its absolutely fine to use this repo.

projects.title: Easy Scrum
projects.description: Easy scrum is an open source D-APP(Decentralized application) where the data is stored in peer network instead of drive in cloud, This application helps agile and scrum development teams effectively set their sprint goals through collaborative planning and consensus-based estimations also helps to do the retrospective more productive and fun way.

projects.title: Cloud Box
projects.description: Cloud Box your personal cloud storage which is open source D-APP(Decentralized application), You can keep notes, files, images, videos and anything without control of anyone.

projects.title: Quick Share
projects.description: Using Quick Share we can send large files Free - Fast secure file transfer up to 1 GB using a secure link.

projects.description: Using Quick Share we can send large files Free - Fast secure file transfer up to 1 GB using a secure link.

projects.title: Easy Scrum Nodejs Solution
projects.description: Easy Scrum server logic was written in Nodejs behind using socket.io. Currently not in production Frontend using Gunjs Decentralized solution.

projects.title: East & West Uniforms
projects.description: East & West Uniforms promises - Quick Delivery, Affordable Price and also Our talented team make sure that there is no compromise in quality of products.

projects.title: Webstore
projects.description: All in one messenger, and entertainment sites like watching videos via YouTube, Likee, and TikTok, Snapchat, sports sites, and online marketing free.  In this lite browser app, you will also find a tab dedicated to games and another tab for local news and global news. It also contains free social networking sites, like all in one social media app for chat, On your smartphone.  If you search for social networks all in one app, get more apps on your social media browser now to save space on your phone.
